attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I’m not part of the gen z thing. I genuinely wanted to know what Donald trump was doing for 2020, and I was thoroughly disappointed in the app. All of the features hardly work, and it’s the bare minimum of an app. It also continuously makes my phone crash no matter what I do about it.

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review:
i got the app to see how it was and it was ✨terrible✨ this app is useless because who would want to support this cheeto puff🧡. all i have to say is, u dropped this 🔴now put it back on ur nose 🤡✨😍. 
- I spoke to the queen of the tré🌿🌳she said no thank you but good try🦋✨🌈🥰💓

attributes.title: ✨ creepy and no privacy ✨
attributes.review: i HATE gen z suddenly giving really bad reviews but hear me out- this app took FOREVER to download!!!!!!! and then before i even OPENED it, it was already sending me notifications?????? it was al very, very creepy so i HAD to delete it!!!!!!! my privacy is everything!!!!!

attributes.title: I thought it gave me free Cheetos
attributes.review:
I got this app thinking I was gonna get some free Cheetos. Turns out it was this horrible looking oompa looking thing. What I seen when I first opened the app was hideous. I’ve seen nothing like it before. I mean how many Cheetos can one eat to turn into one! This app is a waste of time! #BLACKLIVESMATTER #JUSTICEFORGEORGEFLOYD
#JUSTICEFORBREONNATAYLOR

attributes.title: Please don’t download this app.
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. I can’t believe how many times it crashed on me and there are so many bugs. You’d think with all these reviews they would fix it but nooo they haven’t. It’s really disappointing.

attributes.title: This app should not be on here
attributes.review: Not only does this app spread fake news it just isn’t up to the standards that the App Store has. The app claims to be helpful but instead made me feel sad, angry, disappointed, and frustrated from the moment I opened it. Please remove this disgrace.

attributes.title: Slowed down phone
attributes.review: I’m surprised to see so many others had my same experience. The app was extremely laggy and slow and made my phone laggy for about 3 minutes even after I closed it.

attributes.title: ✨disappointed✨
attributes.review: i am deeply disappointed of this app. when i opened it the first thing i saw was an 🍊. gross. that was the first red flag, but as i looked harder i saw that the front had writing saying “mAkE AmErIcA gReAt AgAiN.” but tbh this made me chuckle since america will not be great as long as he is president ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

this is the most outwardly bigoted person i’ve ever seen. his politics are nothing but harmful to absolutely everyone except for white cishet men. now he’s trying to take away one of our platforms, so let’s take away one of his - also his mercy is ugly and has strong reference to the K*K and N*zis 👀

attributes.userName: clout they will do it again
attributes.title: Worst app of 2020
attributes.review: This is not a good app at all! I would never download it again! It is so glitchy. It logs me out of every time I go on the app! I also do not support trump in any way. He is a terrible person and I would never vote for him. Do not recommend to others!
